original: Reduced the encumberance of the armor when using this type of armor
translate: The penalty to encumbrance when wearing this type of armour is reduced

original: Added to Dodge when using a shield
translate: Added to Dodge when using a shield

original: Describes the percentage of Hits that are upgraded to Critical Hits
translate: Describes the percentage of Hits that are upgraded to Critical Hits

original: A bonus that is added to the melee damage range based on the characters strength
translate: Increases potential melee damage dealt by adding a bonus to the damage range based on Strength

original: This is added to the current weapon's damage range for a total damage range
translate: This is added to the current weapon's damage range for a total damage range

original: Initiative determines who goes first in combat
translate: Initiative determines the order in which units take their turn in combat

original: The character's skill at attacking with melee weapons
translate: Represents the character's skill at attacking with melee weapons

original: The characters skill at attacking with ranged weapons
translate: Represents the characters skill at attacking with ranged weapons

original: Resistance to a condition represents the percentage chance to avoid contracting the condition
translate: Resistance to a condition represents the percentage chance to avoid contracting said condition

original: An attribute value of 100% or above means immunity to the condition in question
translate: An attribute value of 100% or above equates to an immunity to said condition

original: Creature Damage bonuses increase the Damage dealt against certain types of creatures
translate: Creature Damage bonuses increase the Damage dealt against certain creature types

original: Damage bonuses increase the Damage dealt when using the indicated attack type
translate: Damage bonuses increase the Damage dealt when using the indicated attack type

original: Damage Type bonuses increase the Damage dealt when the Damage is of the indicated type
translate: Damage Type bonuses increase the Damage dealt when the Damage is of the indicated type

original: Weapon Damage bonuses increase the Damage dealt when using the indicated Weapon type
translate: Weapon Damage bonuses increase the Damage dealt when using the indicated Weapon type

original: Damage Resistance reduces incoming Damage of the indicated type by a percentage amount equal to the attribute value
translate: Damage Resistance reduces incoming Damage of the indicated type by a percentage amount equal to the attribute value

original: A value of 100% or higher means immunity to this damage type
translate: A value of 100% or greater equates to an immunity to this damage type

original: A negative value means a vulnerability to the damage type
translate: A negative value results in a vulnerability to the indicated damage type

original: If this is the case, incoming Damage will be increased
translate: If this is the case, incoming Damage will be increased

original: The ability to avoid incoming attacks and other reflex-based dangers
translate: Represents how adept a character is at avoiding incoming attacks and other reflex-based dangers

original: In other words, this determines how hard a character is to hit
translate: In other words, this determines how hard a character is to hit

original: The character’s ability to withstand adverse physical effects such as disease and poison
translate: The character’s ability to withstand adverse physical effects such as disease and poison

original: Willpower describes a character’s ability to withstand mind-affecting conditions such as those caused by spells
translate: Represents the amount of fortitude a character possesses: that is to say their ability to withstand mind-affecting conditions, such as those caused by spells

original: Critical bonuses increase your critical chance for the indicated weapon type
translate: Critical bonuses increase your critical chance for the indicated weapon type

original: This bonus applies to Light Weapons
translate: This bonus applies to Light Weapons

original: Maneuver Hit Bonuses are added to the To Hit roll when performing Combat Maneuvers
translate: Manoeuvre Hit Bonuses are added to the To Hit roll when performing Combat Manoeuvre

original: Creature Hit Bonuses are added to the To Hit roll when attacking the indicated creature type
translate: Creature Hit Bonuses are added to the To Hit roll when attacking the indicated creature type

original: Weapon Hit Bonuses are added to the To Hit roll when using weapons of the indicated type
translate: Weapon Hit Bonuses are added to the To Hit roll when using weapons of the indicated type

original: Describes a character's magical energy and determines how many spells can be cast
translate: Describes a character's magical energy, determining the number of spells that may be cast

original: Attunement refills fully when the character rests in a camp
translate: Attunement fully refills when resting in a camp

original: Note that different classes use different root abilities for Attunement
translate: N.B. Different classes use different Primary Stats when calculating their Attunement

original: The Magical Aptitude score is added to the numerical value of spells such as the amount of damage dealt or vitality healed
translate: The Magical Aptitude score is added to the numerical value of spells, such as the damage dealt or vitality healed

original: The maximum numbers of spells a spellcaster can cast in a single turn due to Cascade effects
translate: Determines the highest number of Spells that can be cast in a single turn due to Cascade effects

original: The value of this attribute indicates the maximum tier of spell from that school the character may cast
translate: The value of this attribute indicates the maximum tier of spell from that school the character may cast

original: If non-zero, this number is added to the radius of your spells with Aura-shaped area of effects
translate: If non-zero, this value is added to the radius of your spells with an Aura-shaped area of effect

original: If non-zero, this number is added to the width and length of your spells with Line- and Cone-shaped areas of effects
translate: If non-zero, this value is added to the width and length of your spells with a Line- or Cone-shaped areas of effect

original: If non-zero, this number is added to the radius of your spells with Sphere-shaped area of effects
translate: If non-zero, this number is added to the radius of your spells with a Sphere-shaped area of effect

original: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Air magic spells you may cast
translate: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Air magic spells you may cast

original: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Bardic magic spells you may cast
translate: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Bardic magic spells you may cast

original: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Body magic spells you may cast
translate: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Body magic spells you may cast

original: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Earth magic spells you may cast
translate: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Earth magic spells you may cast

original: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Fire magic spells you may cast
translate: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Fire magic spells you may cast

original: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Mind magic spells you may cast
translate: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Mind magic spells you may cast

original: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Nature magic spells you may cast
translate: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Nature magic spells you may cast

original: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Spirit magic spells you may cast
translate: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Spirit magic spells you may cast

original: A measure of hand-eye coordination, nimbleness and dexterity
translate: A measure of hand-eye co-ordination, overall nimbleness and dexterity.

original: Describes how tough and resilient a character is
translate: A measure of a character's toughness and physical resilience

original: Mental acuity, recall and analytical skill
translate: Mental acuity, recall, and analytical skill

original: A character's ability to read and react to the surrounding environment and people
translate: A character's ability to read and react to the surrounding environment and to people

original: A measure of a character's brawn and physical power
translate: A measure of a character's brawn and physical power

original: The percentage chance that an arrow fired by the character in combat can be recovered and reused
translate: The percentage chance that a character's fired arrows in combat can be recovered and reused

original: The number of Attacks the character can potentially perform in a full round of combat
translate: The potential number of Attacks the character can perform in a full round of combat

original: Typically a character cannot perform multiple Attacks if they also move, or perform move-equivalent actions the same turn
translate: If a character moves, they may not typically perform multiple Attacks or move-equivalent actions within the same turn

original: If a successful Backstab Attack is performed, this Attribute is multiplied by the Weapon’s Crit multiplier and added to the total Damage
translate: If a successful Backstab Attack is performed, this Attribute is multiplied by the Weapon’s Crit multiplier and added to the total Damage

original: A bonus in pounds added to the character’s Carrying Capacity
translate: A bonus, in pounds, added to the character’s Carrying Capacity

original: If a character is charging, this bonus is added on top of the base charge bonus
translate: If a character is Charging, this bonus is added on top of the base charge bonus

original: The charge bonus is added to the following attack’s To Hit and Damage roll
translate: The charge bonus is added to the following attack’s To Hit and Damage roll

original: The bonus that is added to a character’s Dodge value when performing the Defend action
translate: The bonus that is added to a character’s Dodge value when performing the Defend action

original: The bonus that is added to a character’s To Hit roll when attacking a Flanked opponent
translate: The bonus that is added to a character’s To Hit roll when attacking a Flanked opponent

original: This attribute provides a percentage bonus increase of the amount of gold you find by looting corpses after combat
translate: This attribute provides a percentage bonus increase of the amount of gold found when looting corpses following combat

original: The number of tiles a character can move during a single combat turn and still attack
translate: The number of tiles a character can move during a single combat turn and still attack

original: If wielding a shield, you get a bonus to Dodge for each adjacent ally up to your Phalanx value
translate: When holding a shield, the character receives a bonus to Dodge for each adjacent ally up to your Shield Wall value

original: This means that you do not get any such bonus if your bonus is
translate: This means that you do not get any such bonus if your bonus is

original: If above 0, you regain a number of Vitality points at the beginning of each combat turn equal to your Regeneration score
translate: If Vitality is above zero, at the beginning of each turn you will gain Vitality points equal to your Regeneration score

original: If above 0, you deal damage equal to your retribution score to any opponents that score a melee attack hit against you
translate: If above zero, you deal damage equal to your retribution score to any opponents that land a melee attack against you

original: Natural soak represents soak derived from a thick skin or unnaturally high resistance to physical damage
translate: Natural soak is a representation of a high resistance to physical damage, granted by a thick skin or some other means

original: If above 0, this attribute provides a percentage bonus to all XP gained for this character
translate: If above zero, this attribute provides a percentage bonus to all experience this character gains

original: Vitality describes the amount of damage a character can take before becoming seriously wounded
translate: Vitality describes the amount of damage a character can take before they begin taking Wounds damage, where they begin becoming seriously wounded

original: Vitality is fairly easily regained through the use of consumable items and spells
translate: Vitality may be regained through the use of consumable items and spells

original: Wounds represent serious injury to the character
translate: Wounds represent serious injuries sustained by the character

original: Wounds are much harder to recover for characters, typically requiring bed rest
translate: Once afflicted, Wounds cannot be recovered from easily, typically requiring a period of convalescence; bed rest

original: Athletics are used to jump, climb, swim or sprint
translate: Athletics is used to jump, climb, swim, or sprint

original: The ability to notice small details and hidden things
translate: The ability to notice small details and otherwise hidden things

original: Crafting is used when creating items at crafting stations
translate: Crafting is used when creating items at crafting stations

original: Diplomacy is used to lie, bargain or sway others in negotiations
translate: Diplomacy is used in negotiations, bargaining, duplicity, and to generally convince others

original: Healing is used in camp to increase the rate of wound recovery for wounded characters
translate: Healing is used in camp to increase the rate of Wound recovery

original: It also influences the amount of vitality regained from healing potions and is used in dialogue tests when dealing with medical issues and such
translate: It also influences the amount of vitality regained from healing potions and represents a characters medical knowledge and proficiency in dialogue tests
Stealth is actively used during adventuring

original: In particular it determines if NPCs notice the party as it moves around
translate: In particular, it determines if NPCs notice the party as it moves

original: Survival is used to forage for food, navigate difficult overland terrain and also determines a character's general knowledge of nature
translate: Survival is used when foraging, navigating difficult overland terrain; and represents the insight a character has in the ways of nature

original: Used to pick locks and pockets as well as to steal from shops
translate: Used to pick locks, lift pockets, and steal from shops
